Scientist:

"She could suspect that he was reprogramed"said the male"What i=
f he is reactivated first and she woke up later... in other quarters and th=
en he convinced her?? I can do that she sleep a while more after she leaves=
 crs... she never will suspect that his husband was reprogramed, then she w=
on't have other option than remain... First she was to sent to the quarters=
 and then he could wake up, give him the greetings and sent him to his wife=
"

 process just ended, without problem"said the male "He will believe that he=

n you desire; the problem is his wife... A bit stubborn the lady, and as I =

 LEgedn would become widower... SHe's repaired, but not reprogramed; and th=
